which-attached-documentation: What document do you wish to attach?
info-option-documentation-text: You also have the option to present the Certificates at the Kiosko (truck parking):
recommended-option-documentation-text: However, we recommend that you attach the certificates now, as it will reduce your waiting time at the complex.
select-data-last-load: Select the data associated with your last loading note:
confirm-data-last-load: ¿Confirmas que la última carga realizada con tu matrícula actual tiene estos datos?:
num-identification: Tax identification number/Foreigner identification number/Passport number
notice-modal-text: Select which action you want to take for this delivery note.
notification-map: Driver of the vehicle {registrationNumber}, head to the {warehouse} following the indications shown on the map.
notify-driver: Notify the driver to contact their ET.
observations-form-label: Write to us if you have any remarks for the delivery at destination.

pending-tests.title: Tests pending
pending-tests.text-a: We remind you that you have
pending-tests.text-b: Pending tests to be carried out.
pending-tests.text-c: Go to the Dispatch Office to perform them before your time slot.
